email.description: Email for Auth and Task Scheduling

created_at.description: Timestamp when the admin was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the admin profile was updated

primary_role.description: The primary role of the aircraft

country.description: The country who invented the aircraft

created_at.description: Timestamp when the aircraft data was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the aircraft data was updated

review_date.description: Date when the book is reviewed

created_at.description: Timestamp when the book data was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the book data was updated

continent.description: Continent where the country is located

created_at.description: Timestamp when the casualties data was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the casualties data was updated

reply_id.description: Id of the other discussion who got replied

attachment.description: Detail of attachment attached in the discussion. Contain attachment url, attachment type, and attachment name

created_at.description: Timestamp when the story data was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the story data was updated

created_by.description: ID of the user / admin who created the discussion

updated_by.description: ID of the user / admin who updated the discussion

message.description: Message or description of the error

stack_trace.description: Trail of function calls leading up to the error

file.description: Path of the file where the error is faced

line.description: Line of code in specific file where the error is faced

created_at.description: Timestamp when the error was faced

fixed_at.description: Timestamp when the dev team finally fix and deploy the bug / error fix

faced_by.description: ID of the user who specific faced the error

date_start.description: Date of event when the event was start

date_end.description: Date of event when the event was end

created_at.description: Timestamp when the book data was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the book data was updated

coordinate.description: Date of event when the event was end

created_at.description: Timestamp when the facility data was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the facility data was updated

created_at.description: Timestamp when the feedback data was created

created_by.description: Id of user who created the feedback

created_at.description: Timestamp when the feedback data was created

created_by.description: Id of the user who created the history

year.description: Year when the ships is launched

created_at.description: Timestamp when the ship data was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the ship data was updated

is_finished.description: Indicates if the story is finished

date_start.description: Date when the story was started

date_end.description: Date when the story was end

created_at.description: Timestamp when the story was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the story was last updated

updated_by.description: User who last updated the story

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the story was deleted

role.description: User's role for get access to the apps feature

email.description: Email for Auth and Task Scheduling

email_verified_at.description: Timestamp when the email is validated

created_at.description: Timestamp when the user was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the user profile was updated

created_at.description: Timestamp when the weapon data was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the weapon data was updated
